column2: an A.M. Eatery////My roommate and I made plans to go to this place for brunch on a Saturday
column3: but it got a little late and we didn't get there till about noon (the busiest time at this place). So we had to wait about an hour before we got seated
column4: but the plus was we got to try their amazingly spiked drinks ;). I got the AM Manhattan and it is a must try for all the Manhattan cocktail lovers out there!!
